main event: Three UFO sightings were reported over the North Atlantic on December 2, 1957.
interesting points: The sightings were reported by three individuals at different times (03/0050, 0005, 0107Z).
The objects were described as a light blue light.
The objects were observed at 10-20 feet above the terrain, traveling at a high rate of speed.
The sightings were considered to have insufficient data for any evaluation.
No further details or descriptions of the objects were provided.
